name: Project PoPo
description:
the game is in development right now if you find any bugs or gliches please e-mail me at purohitlavanay@gmail.com and please send feedback and please tell me what should i add to the game and i am going to add upgrades soon and you have to download all files for the game to work and just for you create a folder and name it project PoPo and after download place all files in the folder an play

    https://kenney.nl/assets (all the characters are got from this website)

      https://godotengine.org/ (the game engine i used to make games)
